title: Student Radio
content:
I have a chance to participate in a radio program project for my G.D. School in a local kind of cultural radio station.   
   
We are looking for some topics and ideas for the program (we have a first chance to try and will continue depending on the quality and success) so I wondered if anyone has a sugestion.   
   
Our main problem as G.D. in the community is that our work is not valued, it is perciebed as an artistic ornament for products.   
   
Thanks
author: rs_donsata

comments.content:
So, then, you want to change that perception?   
   
The importance of design as a communication tool? How it functions as opposed to being purely ornamental?   
   
Perhaps a discussion of how design is inescapable and impacts practically everything you do. Most people don't realize that even their road signs are designed.
